caffeinatedsoda.name: Caffeinated Soda
caffeinatedsoda.description: Sets all your current cooldowns to 0, but adds whatever they were at to your next cooldowns.

decaf.name: Decaf
decaf.description: The next card you pull is guaranteed to contain Cole Brew or a coffeeshop worker. You can only use one item of this type at a time.

beepingpager.name: Beeping Pager
beepingpager.description: The next card you pull is guaranteed to contain medical staff. You can only use one item of this type at a time.

breadcrumbs.name: Breadcrumbs
breadcrumbs.description: The next card you pull is guaranteed to contain a bird. You can only use one item of this type at a time.

clownnose.name: Clown Nose
clownnose.description: The next card you pull is guaranteed to be humorous or a meme card. You can only use one item of this type at a time.

fancyteaset.name: Fancy Tea Set
fancyteaset.description: The next card you pull is guaranteed to contain Samurai or Insomniac. You can only use one item of this type at a time.

lunarrocks.name: Lunar Rocks
lunarrocks.description: The next card you pull is guaranteed to contain Miner or Lucia. You can only use one item of this type at a time.

secretadmirersnote.name: Secret Admirers Note
secretadmirersnote.description: The next card you pull is guaranteed to contain Logan or Hailey. You can only use one item of this type at a time.

stickontabs.name: Stick-on Tabs
stickontabs.description: The next card you pull is guaranteed to be an editor card. You can only use one item of this type at a time.

tapiocapudding.name: Tapioca Pudding
tapiocapudding.description: The next card you pull is guaranteed to contain Mr. or Mrs. Stevenson. You can only use one item of this type at a time.

replacementvoid.name: Replacement Void
replacementvoid.description: The contents of the Peculiar Box get replaced with a random selection of cards.

xraygoggles.name: X-ray Goggles
xraygoggles.description: Sends you a DM with the current contents of the Peculiar Box

scratchoffticket.name: Scratch-off Ticket
scratchoffticket.description: Comes in a pack of 3. Very small chance to win a large quantity of tokens upon use.

giftairstrike.name: Gift Air Strike
giftairstrike.description: Gives 30 random people a copy of a random card from your inventory.

megaphone.name: Megaphone
megaphone.description: Sends a message in #trading-cards from the RDCards bot.
